Posts.Content: I have been taking anastozole since Dec 2014.  I just started noticing sm red blotches around my eyes and my eyes seem to be more sensitive and dryer since starting the medication.  Not happy about it.
Posts.Title: Arimidix (anastrozole) skin side effects?

Posts.Content: My red spots are disappearing.  After further investigation, staff at the clinic thought the spots were due to too much moisturizer with sun screen in the eye area.
Posts.Title: Arimidix (anastrozole) skin side effects?
